name: crunch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
